post.text: #CrookedHillary  is nothing but an elitist, Washington insider who has been doing this for 30 years with nothing to show for it!

comment.author: Alex
comment.text: Donald Trump can't be the president of USA. He is not a warrior. America will NOT be great again if he wins. The choice should be easy. He can't be the next president of United States of America.

replies.author: Alyssa
replies.text: Lol she is no warrior either..

replies.author: Alex
replies.text: Why? Because I have a different opinion?

replies.author: Alex
replies.text: Why? I need facts people. You are making no sense
